    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GatlingCannon

    public abstract class BaseWeaponComponent
extends GameEntity
    BaseWeaponComponent.java

    Defines a base object for the Main Weapon.

    Version:
    1.1 15/04/2015
    Author:
    Davide Teixeria
